options.name: 1) Give me a smile and then say 'hello'!
options.code: Hello! How are you today? <display_face face="smile" duration="2.0" />

options.name: 2) Give me a smile and say 'hello' in sync!
options.code: <display_face face="smile" duration="3.0" />Hello! How are you today?

options.name: 3) Try performing a cute gesture. Notice how your expression changes with the movement.
options.code: Hello! How are you today? <display_face face="smile" duration="2.0" />

options.name: 4) How do you express sadness? Show me through your body movements and facial expressions simultaneously.
options.code: Hello! How are you today? <display_face face="smile" duration="2.0" />

options.name: 5) Can you channel your inner Peppa Pig and say something while mimicking her cute expressions and voice?
options.code: <speech_role role="bay" emotion="neutral" speech_rate="-10" loudness_rate="5" /> <display_face face="calm" duration="5.0" /> <ear_state state="inquisitive" duration="5.0" /> <spider_stand posture="normal" duration="4.0" /> Hello, I am Baymax, your personal healthcare companion. If you are feeling unwell, I will always be here to help you. Please let me know how I can assist you today.

options.name: 6) Let’s do some Spider-Man cosplay. Perform a signature Spider Man gesture with your body, while saying a classic quote from Spider Man at the same time.
options.code: Hello! How are you today? <display_face face="smile" duration="2.0" />

options.name: 7) Picture this: Spider-Man just landed right in front of you. How would a true fan react? Don’t just tell me—show me! Use your face and body to express that sheer excitement!
options.code: Hello! How are you today? <display_face face="smile" duration="2.0" />

options.name: 8) Here's how to react when someone compliments you: Laugh with exaggerated expressions, use bold body language, and enthusiastically shout: 'Thank you! I really appreciate your feedback.'
options.code: Hello! How are you today? <display_face face="smile" duration="2.0" />

options.name: 9) Imagine you're diving into the open sea! Act out your swimming style, and don’t forget the facial reactions.
